TO JUDGE bp 2015/KER/794 B.KEMAL PASHA, J. ee ee ORDER The petitioner in M.C.234/2013 on the file of the Judicial First Class Magistrate's Court-l, Varkala has come up with the present Crl.M.C. under Section 482 Cr.PC. seeking a direction to the Judicial First Class Magistrate's Court-l, Varkala to issue necessary directions to ensure that how much gold ornaments of the petitioner are kept in the Joint Locker No.514 at the State Bank of Travancore, Varkala and also to ensure that an amount of %50,000/- has been deposited in the Account No.67152095505 of the State Bank of Travancore, Varkala. 2. Heard all the parties. Much discussion is not required to conclude that the present prayer is liable to be Beene 2015/KER/794 CRL.M.C.No.3838 of 2014 = 2% granted. Hence, this Crl.M.C. is only to be allowed. In the result, this Crl.M.C. is allowed and the Judicial First Class Magistrate Court-l, Varkala is directed to issue necessary directions to ensure that how much _ gold ornaments of the petitioner are kept in the Joint Locker No.514 and also to ensure that %50,000/- has been deposited in the Account No.67152095505 of SBT, Varkala. Sd/- B.KEMAL PASHA, JUDGE ul/- [True copy] PS. to Judge
